sqlmap.sql: INSERT INTO user(id, name, password, birthday, age) values(?,?,?,?,?)
SELECT * FROM user WHERE id = ?
SELECT * FROM user ORDER BY id
DELETE FROM user
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user WHERE id = ?
UPDATE user SET name = ?, password = ?, birthday = ?, age = ? where id = ?
INSERT INTO userCalender(id, date, sleepTime, exerciseTime, waterIntake, startDay, endDay) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
SELECT * FROM userCalender WHERE id = ? AND date = ?
SELECT * FROM userCalender ORDER BY id, date DESC
SELECT * FROM userCalender WHERE id = ?
DELETE FROM userCalender
DELETE FROM userCalender WHERE id = ? AND date = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM userCalender
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM userCalender GROUP BY id = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM userCalender WHERE id = ? AND date = ?
UPDATE userCalender SET sleepTime = ?, exerciseTime = ?, waterIntake = ?, startDay = ?, endDay = ? WHERE id = ? AND date = ?
INSERT INTO userMucus(id, date, none, mottled, sticky, creamy, likeEggWhite, watery, abnormal) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
SELECT * FROM userMucus WHERE id = ? AND date = ?
SELECT * FROM userMucus ORDER BY id, date DESC
SELECT * FROM userMucus WHERE id = ?
DELETE FROM userMucus
DELETE FROM userMucus WHERE id = ? AND date = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM userMucus
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM userMucus GROUP BY id = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM userMucus WHERE id = ? AND date = ?
UPDATE userMucus SET none = ?, mottled = ?, sticky = ?, creamy = ?, likeEggWhite = ?, watery = ?, abnormal = ? WHERE id = ? AND date = ?
DELETE FROM userMucus WHERE id = ? AND date = ?

INSERT INTO userSymptom(id, date, none, cramps, breastTenderness, headache, acne, lumbago, nausea, fatigue, abdominalBloating, desires, insomnia, constipation, diarrhea) VALUES(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
SELECT * FROM userSymptom WHERE id = ? AND date = ?
SELECT * FROM userSymptom ORDER BY id, date DESC
SELECT * FROM userSymptom WHERE id = ?
DELETE FROM userSymptom
DELETE FROM userSymptom WHERE id = ? AND date = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM userSymptom
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM userSymptom GROUP BY id = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM userSymptom WHERE id = ? AND date = ?

UPDATE userSymptom SET none = ?, cramps = ?, breastTenderness = ?, headache = ?, acne = ?, lumbago = ?, nausea = ?, fatigue = ?, abdominalBloating = ?, desires = ?, insomnia = ?, constipation = ?, diarrhea = ? WHERE id = ? AND date = ?
DELETE FROM userSymptom WHERE id = ? AND date = ?
INSERT INTO userPhysiology(id, startPhysiology, endPhysiology, expectedOvulationDate, expectedPhysiologyDate) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
SELECT * FROM userPhysiology WHERE id = ? ORDER BY startPhysiology ASC
SELECT * FROM userPhysiology WHERE id = ? AND startPhysiology = ?
SELECT * FROM userPhysiology WHERE id = ? ORDER BY startPhysiology DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM userPhysiology
SELECT * FROM userPhysiology WHERE id = ? ORDER BY startPhysiology DESC LIMIT 6
SELECT * FROM userPhysiology WHERE id = ? AND (MONTH(startPhysiology) = ? OR MONTH(endPhysiology) = ?)
DELETE FROM userPhysiology
DELETE FROM userPhysiology WHERE id = ? AND startPhysiology = ?
DELETE FROM userPhysiology WHERE id = ? AND endPhysiology = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM userPhysiology
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM userPhysiology WHERE id = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM userPhysiology WHERE id = ? AND startPhysiology = ?
UPDATE userPhysiology SET endPhysiology = ?, expectedOvulationDate = ?, expectedPhysiologyDate = ? WHERE id = ? AND startPhysiology = ?
